# LLM Design System - Quick Reference

## Overview

This is a design system for SaaS energy industry applications, optimized for LLM accessibility. Built with React + TypeScript, Radix UI primitives, Tailwind CSS, and W3C Design Tokens.

## Tech Stack

- **React + TypeScript**: Component library foundation
- **Radix UI**: Accessible, unstyled primitives
- **Tailwind CSS**: Utility-first styling
- **W3C Design Tokens**: Standardized design values
- **Style Dictionary**: Token transformation
- **Storybook**: Component documentation

## Project Structure

```
packages/
  tokens/     # Design tokens (W3C format)
  ui/         # Component library
apps/
  docs/       # Storybook app
mcp/          # MCP servers for AI integration
```

## Component Usage

### Import Pattern

```tsx
import { Button, Input, Card } from '@design-system/ui';
```

### Button

```tsx
<Button variant="default" size="default">Click me</Button>
<Button variant="outline" size="sm">Small</Button>
<Button variant="destructive">Delete</Button>
```

Variants: `default`, `destructive`, `outline`, `secondary`, `ghost`, `link`
Sizes: `default`, `sm`, `lg`, `icon`

### Input

```tsx
<Input type="text" placeholder="Enter text..." />
<Input type="email" placeholder="email@example.com" />
```

### Card

```tsx
<Card>
  <CardHeader>
    <CardTitle>Title</CardTitle>
    <CardDescription>Description</CardDescription>
  </CardHeader>
  <CardContent>Content</CardContent>
  <CardFooter>Footer</CardFooter>
</Card>
```

### Dialog

```tsx
<Dialog>
  <DialogTrigger>Open</DialogTrigger>
  <DialogContent>
    <DialogHeader>
      <DialogTitle>Title</DialogTitle>
      <DialogDescription>Description</DialogDescription>
    </DialogHeader>
  </DialogContent>
</Dialog>
```

### Select

```tsx
<Select>
  <SelectTrigger>
    <SelectValue placeholder="Select..." />
  </SelectTrigger>
  <SelectContent>
    <SelectItem value="option1">Option 1</SelectItem>
    <SelectItem value="option2">Option 2</SelectItem>
  </SelectContent>
</Select>
```

### Checkbox

```tsx
<Checkbox checked={checked} onCheckedChange={setChecked} />
```

## Design Tokens

### Colors

- Primary: `primary-{50-950}`
- Secondary: `secondary-{50-950}`
- Neutral: `neutral-{50-950}`
- Semantic: `success-{50-700}`, `warning-{50-700}`, `error-{50-700}`, `info-{50-700}`
- Background: `background-default`, `background-elevated`, `background-overlay`
- Foreground: `foreground-default`, `foreground-muted`, `foreground-subtle`
- Border: `border-default`, `border-strong`, `border-subtle`

### Spacing

Scale: `0`, `1` (0.25rem), `2` (0.5rem), `3`, `4` (1rem), `5`, `6`, `8`, `10`, `12`, `16`, `20`, `24`, `32`, `40`, `48`, `64`

### Typography

Font sizes: `xs`, `sm`, `base`, `lg`, `xl`, `2xl`, `3xl`, `4xl`, `5xl`, `6xl`
Font weights: `normal` (400), `medium` (500), `semibold` (600), `bold` (700)
Line heights: `none`, `tight`, `snug`, `normal`, `relaxed`, `loose`

### Radius

Values: `none`, `sm`, `base`, `md`, `lg`, `xl`, `2xl`, `full`

## Styling Patterns

### Utility Classes

Use Tailwind utility classes. Merge classes with `cn()` utility:

```tsx
import { cn } from '@design-system/ui';

<div className={cn('flex items-center', className)} />
```

### Component Variants

Components use `class-variance-authority` (cva) for variants:

```tsx
const buttonVariants = cva('base-classes', {
  variants: {
    variant: { default: '...', outline: '...' },
    size: { default: '...', sm: '...' },
  },
});
```

## Best Practices

1. **Always use design tokens** - Never hardcode colors, spacing, or typography
2. **Accessibility first** - All components use Radix UI primitives for accessibility
3. **TypeScript** - All components are fully typed
4. **Component composition** - Use shadcn/ui pattern (components live in codebase)
5. **Energy industry focus** - Support dense UIs, high contrast, data visualization

## Token Naming

- Semantic naming: `color.primary.500`, `spacing.4`
- Use scale values: `50-950` for colors, numeric for spacing
- Reference tokens: `{color.neutral.900}` syntax in tokens.json

## File Locations

- Components: `packages/ui/src/components/{name}/{name}.tsx`
- Tokens: `packages/tokens/tokens.json`
- Stories: `packages/ui/src/components/{name}/{name}.stories.tsx`
- Styles: `packages/ui/src/styles/globals.css`

## MCP Integration

Use MCP servers for:
- Querying components: `get_component`, `list_components`
- Accessing tokens: `get_tokens`
- Figma sync: `sync_tokens_from_figma`, `sync_tokens_to_figma`
